name: Lolly's Locket
description:
Lolly's Locket is an RPG Maker-like horror game. Lolly has misplaced her locket, and discovered it was taken by a vampire known as Master Alistar. She decides to head to his house, and try to take it back!

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys - move

E - Interact

Dialogue:

Red button is SKIP, Yellow is CONTINUE.

WS/UpDown - Select option

E - Confirm

Inventory:

i - open

Click on items in the list to see their descriptions

Right click - to read any books/notes

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2021! The theme was Lost & Found. The game still needs some work, but please let us know if there are any bugs or glitches!

NOTE: There are currently a few issues that might cause the game to not be completable, we are working on fixing these as soon as possible :)

Made By:

Natalie Cordeiro

Samantha Fallahi

Music by: Tim Beek https://timbeek.itch.io/royalty-free-music-pack

Some Sounds from: https://simon13666.itch.io/sound-starter-pack
